entry.title: What we do in the shadows
entry.summary:
Author: WholesomeSewerRat

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,219Chapters: 2/20Kudos: 14

Summary: Kidnapped and auctioned off. Yikes! But oh, yay, rich boy Dick Grayson is here to save the day. Jason watches from the shadows, enraged at how close Dick is getting to his girl. Not that she knows. I dunno, mostly crack fr. I think I'm hilarious, but feel free to prove me wrong. Lots of OOC, I don't think I've picked up a Batman comic since I was like 15, dude. Also, I did not edit this, so punctuation be damned, and I genuinely can't spell to save my life. Lastly, short as hell chapters. Just writing this when I get sick of the novel I'm working on.

entry.title: When Gotham Calls (You Can't Decline)
entry.summary:
Author: BattyBabe1992

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 34,230Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 535

Summary: You'd lived in Gotham your whole life with only minor incidents but when you were eleven, you lost your parents to the Penguin. Luckily, Bruce Wayne came to your rescue.Now, many years after you'd been taken from Gotham, you run into someone who takes you home.Things have changed a lot since you were last in Gotham, but when Gotham calls, you can't decline.This is just a silly lil fic (it's treated seriously) shipping you (the reader) with all the Batboys bar Bruce. Ft shipping with Kara (Supergirl) and Babs later down the line.

entry.title: To Look Just Like You
entry.summary:
Author: anastasia1513

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,019Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 11

Summary: “You love me, I know you do. Why do you keep doing this?” He laughed, a harsh, bitter sound. “Love you? I don’t even know what that means. What I do know is that I’m a knight, a bastard from the gutters. I kill and I bleed for your father, the King. You are a princess. You are the sun, and I’m… I’m the mud you walk on. You deserve a prince, not a broken man with blood on his hands.” He strode to the door, pulling on his tunic with sharp, angry movements. “You’ll be happier with someone else. Someone who can give you the life you’re meant for.” He paused with his hand on the doorknob, his back still to you. “Forget last night ever happened.”

entry.title: Adjustments
entry.summary:
Author: gingerandcinnamon07

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,619Chapters: 4/5Kudos: 43

Summary: After a mission helping Constantine goes awry, you and Jason now have to navigate him being bitten by a werewolf (yes) and all the small, or large, adjustments that come with that. While Constantine works to find a reversal — after all, he got you all into this mess and portal-hopping-lycanthropes weren’t in the mission briefing — the two of you try to just take it all business as usual. Course that’s pretty difficult when there’s a whole family of bats getting in the way, Jason starts getting growly, and you’re fairly certain that this is all some weird fever dream. What could go wrong?

entry.title: Gotham Nights: Shadow and Red
entry.summary:
Author: lilmarshiefics

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,223Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 0

Summary: In the shadowed alleys and towering skyscrapers of Gotham City, a new protector emerges to stand alongside the infamous Red Hood. F/N L/N, known as Nightshade, is a 27-year-old vigilante wielding enhanced agility, gravity manipulation, and energy shields. Haunted by a personal tragedy, Nightshade dedicates their life to shielding Gotham's innocents from the encroaching darkness. Teaming up with Jason Todd, the Red Hood, Nightshade navigates the treacherous criminal underbelly of Gotham. As they confront petty thieves and escalating threats, a surge of energy at the Gotham Docks signals a sinister plot brewing beneath the surface. Together, they face armed thugs and uncover a conspiracy that threatens to plunge the city into chaos. As Nightshade and the Red Hood delve deeper into the shadows, they realize they are caught in the crossfire of a larger game. Their partnership is tested as they confront not only external enemies but also their own inner demons. In a city teetering on the brink, Nightshade and the Red Hood must rise above the darkness to save Gotham from descending into utter chaos.

entry.title: The Gotham Promethus
entry.summary:
Author: up_tonogood

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,600Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 29

Summary: A reimagining of Mary Shelley’s Frankenstein: The Modern Prometheus, but the creature is Jason Todd. Dick Grayson sails into the Arctic, chasing whispers that his lost brother, Jason, may still walk the world of the living. You are a young artist, hired for an Arctic exhibition, who becomes entangled in a web of grief, rebirth, and a bunch of angsty monologues.

entry.title: So smile!
entry.summary:
Author: crying_outlad

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 68,633Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 722

Summary: You'd always heard the phrase "be careful what you wish for", but you had never paid it any mind. And though growing up you had wished, prayed even, for your family's attention, the yearning had slowed down considerably, enough for you to choose to move out from the hell that had become your life.But just before you can leave the old, creaky manor, your wishes finally come true. And it's only after that you learn to appreciate what you had, awful as it was. But maybe, just maybe, you can escape your suffocating family.------------------Yandere! Batfam x Neglected Male! Reader.My Tumblr is the basically same as my AO3 @ lol.@crying-outlad if you're interested. This is the only post there so far anyway.

entry.title: I Left My Heart in Wynwood
entry.summary:
Author: xbeautifulxrealityx

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 762,589Chapters: 98/?Kudos: 807

Summary: A high-stakes heist in Miami should have been a straightforward job, but when you unexpectedly run into your insufferable ex, who makes you the offer of a lifetime.. things spiral out of control. Amidst a whirlwind of chaotic encounters and sizzling new flings, you’re pulled deeper into the lucrative world of alien tech development. As you juggle ambition, romance, and a web of deceit, every reckless decision sends shockwaves through your life. In a world where illusions rule and betrayal lurks at every turn, you must navigate a treacherous path to build your own empire and rise from the ashes of your past.
